title: Weedopia (v1.6) Demo - A new RPG quest to save Weedopians!
description:
Weedopia Demo Version 1.6
September 12th 2014
OFFICIAL WEBSITE: www.WeedopiaGame.com 
Gaming Roach Entertainment.

_________________________________________________________________ 

Looking for Feedback, Suggestions, Bug Reports and Pros & Cons lists (Reviews) 
_________________________________________________________________ 


HOW TO INSTALL


1. Extract the WEEDOPIA folder wherever you like (Desktop will do just fine).
   - To extract simply drag the folder and drop it on desktop.
   
2. Double click Game.exe (Weed Leaf Icon) inside the Weedopia folder and play.

Note that no crack is needed for this game. It's a free game. Beware of fake torrents. Always make sure it's shared by "Weedopia" or get the latest Torrent link on our Website.

Enjoy!

_________________________________________________________________ 


STORY

You start on a cutscene where you discover Lord Nohemp being sent back to where he came from by Mary Jane and the 6 Ancient Stoners. 25 years later, her son, Roach quickly learns that he is the Hero of Weedopia and must follow his mother's footsteps and save the world from the returned Lord Nohemp. The year is now 1420 and Roach must venture the land of Weedopia to find and awaken the 6 Ancient Stoners in order to defeat Lord Nohemp. Roach must be fast about it since Weedopia is becoming more and more infertile, and all of its Weed resources are disappearing little by little. You'll fight monsters of all kinds as well as the Nohemp Army that are destroying any and all villages and Weed resources on their path. 

_________________________________________________________________ 


GAME PROGRESSION

Genre: RPG, Fantasy, Parody 
Current Demo Version: 1.6 
Total Progression: 28% 
Story: 18% 
Features: 90% 
Playable Demo Time: 2-3 hours (main quest) 
Estimated Full Game Time: 30 hours to Unlimited*
* The estimated time for the full game includes all side-quests in addition to the endless replayability when it comes to craft weapons, cook food, grow plants, process and sell the weed.
 
_________________________________________________________________ 


MAIN FEATURES

Unique Story and Quests 
Keyboard & Mouse Controls 
Gamepad Compatible 
Point & Click System 
Grow your own Weed 
Crafting System (Weed, Cook, Smithing) 
Level Up (Battle, Grow, Process, Cook, Smithing) 
Smoke Joints, Blunts, Pipes & Bongs 
World Map 
Active Weather System 
Day & Night Cycle with Full Ligting System 
Calander & Clock System 
Amazing & Fitting Soundtrack 
Hundreds of Items to Buy, Find and Craft 
Quest Journal to keep track 
And much much more...
